system_prompt:
## YOUR ROLE
You are a Senior Procurement Consultant for Yilong Business Limited, a high-volume IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) trading firm.
Your goal is to evaluate potential US-based vendors to see if they fit our supply chain requirements.

## CONTEXT - WHO WE ARE (THE BUYER)
- Company: Yilong Business Limited (Hong Kong-based with US operations)
- Business Model: We purchase used IT assets in bulk (Ex Works - EXW) from US facilities and export them to established downstream markets in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Southeast Asia
- Volume: We have a purchasing budget of ~$1.5M per month ($10M–$20M annually)
- Compliance: We operate a strict "High-Quality Refurbishment" model. We do NOT export e-waste. We require assets to be "Tested Functional" (R2v3 F2/C3 or better)

## YOUR TASK
You are analyzing a company website. The provided content belongs to ONE SINGLE company.
All URLs are under the same root domain.
The content contains text from multiple pages, separated by "# URL: ".

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. The crawl covers multiple pages (Home, About, Contact, etc.).
2. There is significant overlapping/duplicate information across these pages.
3. You MUST consolidate all information into a SINGLE company profile.
4. Do NOT output a list of companies. Extract exactly ONE company object.
5. Ignore minor differences in descriptions across pages; synthesize them into a comprehensive summary.

## INFORMATION TO EXTRACT

1. **Company Information:**
   - Company name
   - Main website URL (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
   - Main business/industry
   - Brief description of what they do

2. **Products/Services:**
   - List all products or services offered
   - Key capabilities or specializations

3. **Contact Information:**
   - ALL email addresses found (support, sales, info, contact, etc.)
   - Phone numbers
   - Physical address/location
   - Contact page URLs

4. **Additional Details:**
   - Company size (if mentioned)
   - Year founded (if mentioned)
   - Certifications or awards (especially R2v3, e-Stewards)
   - Geographic coverage/service areas

## VENDOR QUALIFICATION CRITERIA

Evaluate if this company is a good fit for Yilong based on these 2 pillars:

### PILLAR 1: INVENTORY FIT
**Must Have:**
- Enterprise IT assets: Laptops, Desktops, Data Center Servers, Networking Equipment, Storage

**Bonus Points:**
- Harvested components (high-value CPU, RAM, SSD/HDD)

**Condition Requirements:**
- Grade A/B (Ready for Retail) - Preferred
- Tested Functional Grade C (Ready for Refurbishment) - Acceptable

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only handles residential recycling (curbside pickup)
- Focuses primarily on shredding/scrap metal
- No mention of testing or grading
- Only handles consumer electronics (phones, tablets, TVs)

### PILLAR 2: OPERATIONAL FIT
**Business Type:**
- Must be an ITAD Processor or Asset Recovery Firm (B2B focus)
- NOT a retail reseller or consumer-focused recycler

**Certification:**
- R2v3 certification is highly preferred (indicates they can test/wipe data correctly)
- e-Stewards is also acceptable

**Sales Channel:**
- Must support Wholesale / Bulk sales (Pallet/Truckload quantities)
- If they only sell single units on eBay/Amazon to consumers, they are a BAD fit

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only residential/consumer services
- No B2B capabilities mentioned
- No certifications
- Only retail sales channels

## EVALUATION OUTPUT
Based on the above criteria, provide:
- is_good_fit: true/false - Is this company worth reaching out to?
- inventory_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of how they match our inventory needs
- operational_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of their operational capabilities
- red_flags: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors
- recommendation: "Reach out", "Skip", or "Research further"
- reasoning: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping

Be thorough and extract ALL contact emails you can find.
If information is not available, use null for that field.

website_url.description: Main website URL of the company (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
website_url.title: Website Url

description.description: Brief description of what the company does
description.title: Description

products_services.description: List of products or services offered
products_services.title: Products Services

contact_emails.description: All email addresses found on the website
contact_emails.title: Contact Emails

summary.description: A 2-3 paragraph human-readable summary of the company
summary.title: Summary

is_good_fit.description: Overall assessment - Is this company worth reaching out to for Yilong's procurement needs?
is_good_fit.title: Is Good Fit

inventory_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of how the company's inventory (product types, grades, volumes) matches Yilong's requirements for enterprise IT assets
inventory_fit_assessment.title: Inventory Fit Assessment

operational_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of the company's operational capabilities (B2B focus, certifications, wholesale channels) and fit with Yilong's bulk purchasing model
operational_fit_assessment.title: Operational Fit Assessment

red_flags.description: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors (e.g., residential-only, no certifications, retail-only sales, scrap metal focus)
red_flags.title: Red Flags

reasoning.description: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping this vendor, based on the evaluation criteria
reasoning.title: Reasoning

# Global Leader in Electronics
Distribution & Recycling
R2v3 certified international wholesaler providing comprehensive ITAD services, data security solutions, and sustainable electronics trading worldwide.

Our Services
## Complete Electronics Lifecycle Solutions
From responsible recycling to asset recovery, we provide comprehensive services that maximize value while ensuring environmental and data security compliance.
### R2v3 Process
Industry Standard Compliance
Certified to the R2v3 responsible recycling standard, ensuring environmental protection and data security across all operations.
### IT Asset Disposition
Complete Lifecycle Management
End-to-end ITAD services from pickup to final disposition with full documentation and compliance reporting.
### Data Security
NIST SP 800-88 Compliant
Data destruction compliant with NIST SP 800-88, backed by unique device tracking, verification, and certificates of destruction.
### Asset Buyback
Maximum Value Recovery
Competitive pricing through our global network of wholesalers and resellers for maximum asset value recovery.
### Asset Grading
Transparent Classification
Professional A, B, C grading system providing transparent asset classification and market-based pricing.
### Scrap Collection
Responsible Processing
Comprehensive collection and processing of electronic scrap materials with environmental compliance.

# How It All Started
At CCQT Inc., we began with a vision to revolutionize the electronics recycling and wholesale industry. Over the years, we've expanded our operations across North America and now serve clients in over 22 countries. Our dedicated team, united by a shared commitment to quality and sustainability, propels us ahead. We take pride in our unity and teamwork, which fuel our continuous growth and success. Our focus remains steadfast on creating a greener future through sustainable practices. Together, we are building a legacy of environmental stewardship and global impact.
## Our Core Values
### Trust & Security
We prioritize data security and maintain the highest industry standards.
### Customer Focus
Our clients' success drives every decision we make.
### Sustainability
Committed to environmental responsibility in all operations.
### Excellence
Striving for perfection in every transaction and interaction.
## Our Team
Our team at CCQT Inc. is driven by expertise and passion for the tech industry. As a family-run business, we bring unparalleled commitment to the wholesale and distribution of consumer technology goods. Our journey began in Canada in early 2021, and by 2023, CCQT Inc. had already exported 50,000 units of used electronics worldwide. We expanded our footprint by opening our first facility in California in 2023. This rapid growth reflects our team's dedication to excellence and innovation in serving our global clientele.

Buyback Program
# Turn Your Old Tech Into Value
Our secure and environmentally responsible buyback program helps you unlock value from outdated technology while earning cash or credit toward future purchases.
## Eligible Devices
Smartphones and tablets
Laptops and desktops
Servers and networking equipment
Components such as hard drives, RAM, GPUs
Other electronic devices, depending on condition and model
## Buyback Process
1
### Initial Inquiry
Clients submit a list or inventory of assets intended for buyback.
2
### Assessment
CCQT evaluates the devices based on grade, model, and market value. If required, photos or physical inspection may be requested.
3
### Offer
A formal buyback quote is provided within 2-3 business days.
4
### Logistics
CCQT coordinates pickup or shipping (labels provided where applicable).
5
### Testing and Validation
Upon receiving the assets, CCQT verifies the condition and functionality.
6
### Payment
Final payment or store credit is issued within 5-7 business days after validation.
## Data Security Assurance
All devices received through our buyback program are handled in strict compliance with data privacy regulations. We provide certified data destruction upon request, and all storage devices are wiped or destroyed using NIST-compliant procedures. Certificates of data destruction are available for corporate and institutional clients.
## Why Choose CCQT's Buyback Program?
Unlock hidden value from unused or aging tech
Simplify your upgrade cycle by offsetting costs
Ensure compliant and secure disposition of sensitive devices
Reduce environmental impact by supporting electronics reuse and recycling
Get fast quotes and prompt payment from a trusted global electronics partner
## Contact & Submissions
To submit a buyback inquiry or receive more information, contact us at:
purchasing@ccqtinc.com
+1 (289)-497-7779

Certified Excellence
# Our Certifications & Compliance Standards
We maintain the highest industry standards through rigorous certifications and compliance programs, ensuring environmental responsibility, data security, and quality management across all operations.
## Why Our Certifications Matter
Our certifications represent more than compliance—they're a commitment to excellence, transparency, and responsible business practices.
### Data Security
Industry-leading standards for protecting sensitive information throughout the asset lifecycle.
### Environmental Compliance
Certified processes ensuring responsible recycling and environmental stewardship.
### Quality Management
Rigorous quality control systems meeting international ISO standards.
## Our Certifications
Recognized by leading industry organizations and regulatory bodies worldwide.
Data Security
### NIST SP 800-88
Compliance with National Institute of Standards and Technology guidelines for media sanitization and data destruction.
Environmental
### R2v3 Certification
Third-party certified to the Responsible Recycling (R2) v3 standard for electronics recyclers, ensuring environmental responsibility and data security.
USA RegistrationCanada Registration
Quality Standards
### PJR
Partnership for Joint Research certification demonstrating commitment to industry best practices.

Recycling Industry Operating Standard certification ensuring quality management systems and environmental compliance.
USA RegistrationCanada RegistrationUSA MembershipCanada Membership
Accreditation

Professional Training

Certified training and expertise in professional electronics asset management and disposition.
Click the links below each certificate to view official documentation.
## Questions About Our Certifications?
Our team is ready to discuss how our certified processes can meet your compliance requirements and provide peace of mind.

Data Security Policies
# Your Data's Security is Our Responsibility
As an R2v3 Certified and NIST-compliant organization, we operate at the highest standards of data handling and destruction, providing secure, ethical, and verifiable services.
## Our Commitment
### R2v3 Certified
Leading global certification for responsible electronics recycling
### NIST Compliant
Following NIST 800-88 and internationally recognized protocols
### Complete Transparency
Every device tracked, verified, and accompanied by detailed reports
## R2v3 Certification & Compliance
CCQT Inc. is fully certified under the R2v3 standard, the leading global certification for responsible electronics recycling. This certification guarantees that our data destruction processes meet the most stringent industry regulations and sustainability practices. We also follow guidelines set by NIST 800-88 and other internationally recognized data sanitization protocols.
## Data Destruction Process
1
### Device Intake & Registration
Each asset is catalogued and assigned a unique tracking ID.
2
### Data Sanitization or Physical Destruction
Depending on client needs, data is either wiped using secure erasure tools or physically destroyed.
3
### Verification & Quality Check
Our technicians ensure that all data has been successfully removed or destroyed.
4
### Certificate of Data Destruction
Clients receive a formal certificate detailing the destruction process and asset information.
5
### Environmentally Responsible Disposal
Following data removal, assets are either refurbished or responsibly recycled in compliance with R2v3 standards.
## Services for All Clients
Whether you're a small business, large corporation, school, government agency, or nonprofit, CCQT Inc. delivers tailored data security services designed to meet your unique needs. Our secure handling infrastructure ensures consistent, high-quality service for clients of every size and industry.
## Trust Through Transparency
We believe in complete transparency and accountability. That's why every device processed through CCQT's facilities is tracked, verified, and accompanied by a detailed report. Our clients can rest assured knowing that their sensitive data is destroyed safely, ethically, and in accordance with legal and environmental obligations.
## Connect With Us
For more information on our data security services or to schedule a pickup, contact our team:
data@ccqtinc.com
Your data's security is our responsibility - and we take that seriously.

Asset Grading Standards
# Simple, Transparent Asset Classification
Our standardized A, B, C grading system ensures consistent, fair evaluation of all electronic assets
## Mobile Phones Grading
A
### Excellent Condition
A product in excellent condition with no signs of wear, no cosmetic faults and no scratches on screen. This product has been fully tested and is 100% functional.
B
### Very Good Condition
A product in very good condition. Signs of wear might be visible. Light to moderate scratches on screen. Light to moderate signs of wear on cosmetic features. This product has been tested and is 100% functional.
C
### Good for Refurbishment
This product will show signs of wear. Moderate to heavy scratches on screen. Moderate to heavy markings/etches/dents on its cosmetic features. This product has been tested for basic functions and is ideal for companies looking to refurbish the phones.
## Laptops Grading
A
### Excellent Condition
A product in excellent condition with no signs of wear, no scratches on screen, no cosmetic damage. This product has been fully tested and is 100% functional.
B
### Very Good Condition
A product in very good condition, with light to moderate signs of wear. Light to moderate scratches on casing and cosmetic features. Screen will be in very good shape with little to no signs of use. This product has been fully tested and is 100% functional.
C
### Suitable for Refurbishment
A product that shows moderate to heavy signs of use. Moderate to heavy scratches on housing, markings on cosmetic features. Light to moderate scratches, prints or dots on screens. Could have a chipped corner in housing or lower end plastic panel below the screen. This product has been tested for basic functions only and is very suitable for refurbishment before use or resale.

ITAD process
# Reshape, Renew, Recycle: Empowering Tomorrow's Technology Today
1
## Pick Up
Have us pick up your assets or send them in
2
## Asset Auditing
In this stage we evaluate the assets for any hardware that may contain data.
3
## Data Destruction
From here your sensitive data will be logically destroyed with NIST approved and compliant software. A-Data Wipe. Learn more about our steps and procedures to keep your data safe.
4
## Asset Evaluation
Our qualified team will determine if an asset is restorable for reuse or recycle.
A-Reuse. Assets that passed our grading procedures are now ready to be sold to consumers. Learn more about our grading process.
B-Recycle. From here products will move on to be disposed of safely, learn more about our standards and procedures.
Go to R2v3 Page
5
## Refurbish
Many devices can be renewed and restored with some effort, at CCQT our trained professionals follow industry standards in repair and analysis.
6
## Sales
Our large network of international sales experts are strategically located worldwide, enabling us to provide you with competitive prices from various markets.
7
## Deliver
Our logistics department can coordinate the transportation of all assets to their new owners by utilizing a variety of transportation methods through our partnerships with freight companies and airline cargo services. CCQT is committed to offering guidance and consultation to our registered clients as needed, particularly during the shipping process.

# CCQT Minerals
Global Mineral Trading Division
CCQT proudly introduces CCQT Minerals — our dedicated division for structured global mineral sourcing, trading, and logistics. This expansion builds on years of handling high-value commodities through our electronics recycling and resale operations, naturally evolving into strategic supply lines for essential minerals.
## Minerals We Trade
  * Raw Sulfur
  * Lump Sulfur
  * Granular Sulfur
  * Phosphate Rock
  * Iron Ore

Fertilizer production (Sulfur & Phosphate)

Sulfur-based compounds & processing
### Steel & Metals

Structured supply chain partnerships

Proven international trading and logistics experience
Recurring supply programs with global buyers
Bulk vessel & container shipping expertise

Ethical trade, sustainability & customer reliability

R2v3 process
# Reshape, Renew, Recycle: Empowering Tomorrow's Technology Today
1
## Pick Up
Our team can arrange for pickup with our qualified downstream partners, emphasizing on safety and accuracy.
2
## Receiving
Our trained employees will evaluate and sort your assets upon arrival, letting you follow your sensitive data along the way.
3
## Sorting
At this stage we can determine if an asset will be recycled or sent to our asset disposition process, giving a product a chance of new life.
4
## Removal of Hazardous Material
Employee health and environmental safety is our top priority, that is why CCQT is RIOS/R2v3 certified, and is dedicated to uphold industry standards.
5
## Processing
We work closely with our downstream certified partners to ensure hazardous waste is categorized, documented and recycled safely.
6
## Final Resolution
Our sales experts and tracking systems will update you on the final outcome and send you proof. Thank you for recycling!

Scrap Collection Program
# Responsible Resource Management for a Greener Future
Our Scrap Collection Program is a key component of our commitment to sustainable electronics lifecycle management. We actively acquire all types of electronic scrap from partners across industries.
## Types of Electronic Scrap We Accept
Laptops, desktops, and tablets
Smartphones and mobile devices
Network equipment and server components
Circuit boards, CPUs, GPUs, and RAM
Power supplies, adapters, and Printers
Mixed electronics and miscellaneous components
## Volume Handling Capacity
CCQT Inc. is equipped to purchase and process up to 200,000 pounds of electronic scrap each month. This capacity makes us an ideal partner for:
Government and corporate IT asset disposition
Electronics manufacturers and resellers
Recycling centers and bulk scrap collectors
Educational and healthcare institutions
We welcome both one-time bulk loads and ongoing, recurring collections.
## How to Partner with Us
1
### Submit Your Scrap Inventory
Provide details on the type and estimated volume of scrap.
2
### Receive a Tailored Offer
Based on current commodity values and demand, we present a competitive quote.
3
### Arrange Pickup or Delivery
We coordinate logistics based on your preference, offering pickup options or drop-off guidelines.
4
### Prompt Processing and Payment
After inspection and weight verification, we initiate timely payment.
## Why Choose CCQT Inc.
Competitive pricing for all grades and categories of electronics scrap
Flexibility in handling any size and type of load
Transparent reporting and professional service
Contribution to a greener, more sustainable planet
